scripts.app:rackup: cross-var cross-env INTERFACE=$npm_package_jekyll_opt_interface PORT=$npm_package_jekyll_opt_app_port bundle exec puma -C _data/puma/config.rb
scripts._app:jekyll: cross-var cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=$npm_package_config_mode BUNDLE_GEMFILE=$npm_package_ruby_gemfile bundle exec jekyll b -c $npm_package_jekyll_configfile $npm_package_jekyll_opt_incremental --watch
scripts.algolia: cross-var cross-env ALGOLIA_API_KEY=$npm_package_algolia_admin_key bundle exec jekyll algolia
scripts.algolia-check: cross-var cross-env ALGOLIA_API_KEY=$npm_package_algolia_admin_key bundle exec jekyll algolia --dry-run --verbose
scripts.build:do: cross-env SINATRA_ACTIVESUPPORT_WARNING=false bundle exec jekyll b --incremental
scripts.postbuild:hint: echo To open the site, run: yarn site
scripts.bundler:check: cross-var cross-env BUNDLE_VENDORIZE=$npm_package_ruby_vendorize if-env BUNDLE_VENDORIZE=true && run-s -s bundle_vendor:* || run-s -s bundle_system:*
scripts.bundle_system:info: echo Bundle Rubies using system path ..
scripts.bundle_vendor:info: echo Bundle Rubies using vendor path ..
scripts.rebuild:clean: echo Clean up site files .. && bundle exec jekyll clean
scripts.rebuild:do: cross-env SINATRA_ACTIVESUPPORT_WARNING=false bundle exec jekyll b --incremental
scripts.post-rebuild:hint: echo To open the site, run: yarn site
scripts.clean-site: echo Clean up site files .. && bundle exec jekyll clean
scripts.clean:bundle-config-folder: echo Remove bundle config folder .. && shx rm -rf .bundle
scripts.clean:log-folder: echo Remove log folder .. && shx rm -rf log
scripts.clean:etc-folder: echo Remove etc folder .. && shx rm -rf etc
scripts.clean:logfiles: echo Remove various log files .. && shx rm -f *.log
scripts.clean:locks: echo Remove lock files .. && shx rm -f *.lock && shx rm -f package-lock.json
scripts.reset:start: echo Reset project to factory state ..
scripts.reset:base-clean-files: echo Clean up base modules .. && npm --silent run clean
scripts.reset:utilsrv-clean-files: echo Clean up utility server .. && npm --prefix ./utilsrv --silent run clean
scripts.setup: npm --silent run setup-start && npm --silent run setup-base && run-s -s setup:*
scripts.setup-start: echo Setup project for first use ..
scripts.setup-base: echo Bootstrap base modules .. && echo J1 Project Base modules: > install.log && npm --silent install shx npm-run-all cross-var cross-env >> install.log && echo done.
scripts.set-env:loglevel: cross-var cross-env npm config set jekyll_one_com:loglevel  $npm_package_config_loglevel
scripts.set-env:mode: cross-var cross-env npm config set jekyll_one_com:mode $npm_package_config_mode && echo done.
scripts.setup:create-log-folder: echo Create log folder .. && shx mkdir ./log
scripts.setup:create-log-archived-folder: echo Create archived log folder .. && shx mkdir ./log/archived
scripts.setup:create-etc-folder: echo Create etc folder .. && shx mkdir ./etc && echo done.
scripts.setup:node-modules-base: echo Bootstrap project modules .. && echo J1 Project modules: >> install.log && npm --silent install >> install.log
scripts.setup:node-modules-utilsrv: echo Bootstrap utility server modules .. && echo J1 Utility Server modules: >> install.log && cd utilsrv && npm --silent install >> ../install.log && cd .. && echo done.
scripts.setup:detect-os: echo Detect OS .. && cross-env if-env OS=Windows_NT && cross-var echo "OS detected: $OS" || OS=$(echo $(getos)) && echo "OS detected: $OS" && echo done.
scripts.site:jekyll: echo Startup the site .. && cross-env SINATRA_ACTIVESUPPORT_WARNING=false bundle exec jekyll s --incremental --livereload --skip-initial-build  --livereload-port $npm_package_jekyll_opt_livereload_port --watch --open 2>jekyll.log
scripts.j1-site:jekyll: echo Startup the site .. && cross-env bundle exec jekyll s --incremental --livereload --skip-initial-build --livereload-port $npm_package_jekyll_opt_livereload_port --watch --open 2>jekyll.log
scripts.bump: run-s -s ver && run-s -s bump:* && run-s -s ver
scripts.get_version:jekyll: cross-var cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=$npm_package_config_mode BUNDLE_GEMFILE=$npm_package_jekyll_gemfile bundle exec jekyll --version
